inputs.text: potential oversight issues for congress include the following: how might the changes discussed above affected the planned size and structure of the fleet ? .
for what kinds of ships should navy use sea swap or multiple crewing ? .
how will frp and the forward - homeporting of additional ships affect the distribution of navy ship overhaul and repair work ? .
how many additional ships , of what types , should the navy forward homeport in the pacific , and precisely where ? .
